title: Snowdown Sales?
body: Are we getting the personal sale things again like with last year's snowdown and with the lunar new year?

replies.body:
I haven't seen any official announcements for a personal shop, so I'm not sure it's coming this year. I'd recommend keeping an eye on the [**News page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any announcements.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=u5wsAxsl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-15T03:21:56.807+0000)
>
> I haven't seen any official announcements for a personal shop, so I'm not sure it's coming this year. I'd recommend keeping an eye on the [**News page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any announcements.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

How long will the older skins be out for? I don't want to wait too long and have them be gone :(

The [**Snowdown 2016 Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/snowdown-2016) mentions:

> "All Snowdown content, including skins, wards, and icons, are legacy and will go back into the vault on January 9, 2017 at 23:59 PT."

Don't wait too long! There are some pretty sweet legacy skins and icons to be had before the event ends! Let me know if you have any other questions~
